summary: Data consistency testing for IV, IV Rank, and OI columns across all pages. Dashboard and Watchlist show correct data. Screener Custom Scan shows correct data. Pre-computed scans (Premium Hunter, Income Guard) show IV but IV Rank and OI are '-' due to older stored data from Jan 13. FIXED: Simulator.js now reads iv_rank from scan_parameters - IV Rank now displays correctly (46%, 51%, 45%). OI still shows '-' because open_interest is not stored in scan_parameters when trades are added.

minor.issue: Simulator trades don't expose iv_rank and open_interest at top level. Values are stored in scan_parameters but not accessible in API response for display.
Pre-computed scans from Jan 13 don't have iv_rank and open_interest data. These scans need to be re-run to include the new fields.

ui_bugs.issue: IV Rank and OI columns show '-' for all trades. Frontend reads trade.iv_rank and trade.open_interest but these are stored in trade.scan_parameters.iv_rank
ui_bugs.selector: table tbody tr td (IV Rank, OI columns)

action_items: DONE: Fixed Simulator.js to read iv_rank from trade.scan_parameters.iv_rank - IV Rank now displays correctly
Consider storing open_interest in scan_parameters when adding trades to simulator from screener
Consider re-running pre-computed scans to include iv_rank and open_interest data
Consider updating simulator backend to store iv_rank and open_interest at top level when trade is created
critical_code_review_comments: Dashboard page correctly displays IV (62%), IV Rank (93%), OI (14,432) from live Yahoo Finance data
Watchlist page correctly displays IV, IV Rank, OI from opportunity nested object
Screener Custom Scan correctly displays IV (76.6%), IV Rank (77%), OI (1,417) from live Yahoo Finance data
Screener Pre-computed scans (Premium Hunter) show IV (30.0%) but IV Rank and OI show '-' - data from Jan 13 doesn't include these fields
Simulator trades store iv_rank in scan_parameters.iv_rank but frontend reads from trade.iv_rank which is undefined
PMCC page doesn't have IV, IV Rank, OI columns by design - focuses on LEAPS metrics instead

success_rate.backend: 100% - All APIs return correct data structure
success_rate.frontend: 90% - Dashboard, Watchlist, Screener Custom Scan work correctly. Simulator IV Rank now fixed. OI still shows '-' for simulator trades.

context_for_next_testing_agent: IV, IV Rank, OI data consistency testing completed. Main issue is Simulator page not displaying IV Rank and OI because frontend reads from wrong field path. Pre-computed scans have older data without IV Rank/OI. Custom scans and live data work correctly.

screener_precomputed.note: Pre-computed scans from Jan 13 don't have IV Rank and OI data

simulator.note: IV Rank now displays correctly after fix. OI still shows '-' because open_interest is not stored in scan_parameters

pmcc.note: PMCC page doesn't have IV, IV Rank, OI columns by design

mocked_apis.note: No mocked APIs - all data from real Yahoo Finance
